name: Bucket List Template
description: A bucket list is a list of things that a person wants to do before they die, or "kick the bucket." It typically includes a mix of achievable goals and dream experiences, from learning a new language to traveling to a far-off destination. Keeping a bucket list can help give direction and motivation to one's life, and checking off items from the list can provide a sense of accomplishment and fulfillment. The Notion Bucket List template can be a great tool for organizing and planning out your own b
features: Pre-filled with the most common bucket list items.; Minimalist and aesthetic design.; Designed by Notion Avenue.
